sense.def:
To smile
pomeni raztegniti ustnice tako, da se kotički premaknejo nekoliko navzven in navzgor, ker smo zadovoljni ali se zabavamo.

seg.quote: Hooper smiled and leaned back in his chair.
The girl was smiling at me.

sense.def:
A smile
je izraz na obrazu, ko se smehljamo.

seg.quote: Barber welcomed me with a smile.

sense.def:
To smile something
pomeni nekaj izraziti tako, da se nasmehnemo, ali reči nekaj tako, da se ob tem nasmehnemo.

seg.quote: ‘That remains to be seen,’ smiled Mrs Barrett.
